name: Jetpack Dodo Wonderland ( Winter Special )
description:
We all know that every one has a dream,like this Dodo want to like all other birds but he can’t fly herself. But with a little help
of jetpack dodo has fulfilled her dream to fly with birds to enjoy the wonderland. For now,Dodo has only one dream to fly over wonderland.
With jetpack Dodo has many scientific power to fly safely. Powers are categories below-
1- Shield- if dodo has collected a shield then it will protect her until first collied.
2- Power Booster- is a speed & jump booster with time counter limit.
3- Magnet - helps to gather all coins in wonderland for a specific time limit.
4- Coin doubler - help to increase 2x of total coins.
5- Score doubler- help to increase 2x of current score.
6- UFO - help to protect collision for 3 times and gravity will be reverse like UFO planes.
7- All above power are upgradable by coins.

So friends, help this little Dodo to take enjoy of fly adventure over wonderland.

Game play :-

Game play has 30 mission to complete with infinite runner to navigate through unique natural landscape
and cover maximum distance. It includes beauty go nature so it will be amazing to play.

Tap over the screen to launch jetPack into flight. But be careful with spikes and enemies. Red Zombie Bird is one of most powerful enemy for your angel.

Collect maximum coins,which are usable to exchange with powers and protect her from Red Zombie Bird.
and don’t forgot to gather power booster and UFO shield ,these helps you most to clear mission successfully
